result.story: The Long Island Iced Tea is a classic combination of four different spirits.  Dating back to the 70s, where it was invented for a cocktail competition in, surprise surprise, Long Island in New York. Although it doesn’t actually contain any tea, the look and taste of the cocktail contributed to its name and rise in popularity as the ultimate drink in disguise.
result.name: Long Island Iced Tea
result.descriptionPlain: Fill a chilled highball glass with ice cubes. Add all ingredients. Garnish with lime.
